titleStmt.title: United States District Court for the Southern District of Ohio

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: United States District Court for the Southern District of Ohio

body.p: Located in Cincinnati, Ohio. Judge(s): Humphrey H. Leavitt. Attorney(s): Stanley Mattes and Flamen Ball. Clerk(s): John McLean, Jr., and Nathaniel C. McLean, Jr.

ab.bibl:
Humphrey Howe Leavitt, Autobiography of the Hon. Humphrey Howe Leavitt; Written for His Family, (New York, 1893).
"Meet the U.S. Attorney," History of the United States Attorney Southern District of Ohio, The United States Department of Justice, accessed August 25, 2021, http://justice.gov/.
KYR-0001-022-0006.
